content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case began with the filing of a complaint by one party against another followed by the defendant filing an answer both parties then engaged in the discovery process exchanging documents and conducting depositions a settlement conference was held to try and resolve the dispute but if no settlement was reached the case proceeded to trial after the trial the court issued a judgment determining the outcome of the case either party had the option to file an appeal which would be reviewed by a higher court the text does not provide information on the outcome of the appeal or any further steps in the case the case involved the division of a nondivisible property and the court made a final decision assigning the property to one party and ordering the other party to pay a settlement amount the court also declared that certain costs could not be recovered the text references specific articles of the civil code and civil procedure code and mentions the court and attorneys involved in the case the decision was made by judge dr ac on january 16 2020
